article: I always think my spoken English is so poor that I can't communicate with native English speakers well. So after going to the college, I take as _ English lessons as I can. As long as I am free, I go to English corners and _ English lessons and lectures. To my surprise, I can understand most of _ of the professors who come from Canada, and the USA. However, I haven't had more _ to talk to them in English. Although I _ English articles out aloud every day, I am not sure if I can make myself _ by native English speakers. How I hope I can talk to _ English speakers for a while. I went to the English _ as usual last night. Surprisingly, there were three foreigners sitting there. There , however, were several Chinese students around them, too. "I must not _ this chance," I said to myself. "Hi, nice to meet you." I _ to one of them. "Nice to meet you too." He put out his hand. We _ hands, what a warm hand! Then I _ myself to him. When I told him that I had _ English by myself for three years, he said that it was _ and my English was so good. His words gave me a lot of _ . At that time he hadn't had dinner. He asked us if it was rude or _ to talk to us while he was eating (a) _ . We, said we didn't _ that, only if he was _ to talk to us. He smiled and began to eat his supper.
